name: Botify
author: joaquin@rciag.tech
description:
Discord bot that plays Spotify tracks and YouTube videos or plays any URL including Soundcloud links and Twitch streams.

To configure please read: https://github.com/robinfriedli/botify
Steps  1 to 5

NOTE: YOU NEED A WORKING DATABASE

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Botify Bot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

## Move to install folder
cd /mnt/server/

## Clone repo
git clone -q --depth 1 https://github.com/robinfriedli/botify ./

mvn clean install
